title: menu font help
content: Could someone tell me what font this is? The red cursive one in "Hours & Directions." Thanks! [http://www.minettatavernny.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130526043842/http:/www.minettatavernny.com/ "http://www.minettatavernny.com/")
author: reckoner77

comments.content:
